reviews.title: Great for all skin types
reviews.review_text: This is my go to lotion…for the entire family. There isn't much of a smell. I'd say a fresh, clean smell, if anything. I have dry skin, but this specific option (pure moisture) works great on my skin. It softens and moisturizes without that heavy, greasy feeling. Even my hubs, who has oily skin, really likes this lotion. It works for all skin types. Please restock the larger sizes.

reviews.title: Buying on Repeat
reviews.review_text: I will buy this on repeat. It absorbs great and is not greasy. I use it on my sensitive face and love the moisture it adds. It is starting to get hot, but I think it is still light enough for daily use. That's the hope, because I like to keep my skin hydrated without locking in heat from oily products.
FedEx left my package down by the road a mile away from my house. did not even know it was there a neighbor saw it and brought it to me.
Wow! I've spent a small fortune looking for a light, non-greasy, light or no scent face cream. I should have known Gold Bond would deliver. And it doesn't break the bank!

reviews.title: Nice Lotion
reviews.review_text: This Gold Bond Lotion is very nice. Rich silky formula that really moisterizes the skin well. I wish it had a fragrance but understand that many might be allergic to fragrance. Because it's so rich, I wouldn't use it on my face as it seems to rich for that. Great for feet though. Quality product at a reasonable price. Would recommend to others.

reviews.title: Lovely light fragrance free cream!
reviews.review_text: Love Gold Bond lotions, use daily after daily house cleaning chores. This lotion is lighter and has no fragrance. I gifted some to family members and they loved it too! Highly recommend for daily use to keep hands moisturized and feeling soft after exposure to detergents, or blessed with aging skin.

reviews.title: The lotion is pretty thin
reviews.review_text: This was a replacement for the regular gold bond ultimate healing. Definitely not as thick as the kind I normally get. Seems to make your skin soft but, I prefer the ultimate healing.
Cream absorbs into my hands immediately. Hydrates and leaves my hands feeling soft. Plus my nails love it too.

reviews.title: love!!!
reviews.review_text: I love this product! My skin has been dry, and I could not find a lotion that was not greasy on my face and body—until now! This lotion rubs into your skin as if an angel did it!

reviews.title: Best lotion
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite gold bond. You can use it every where. It goes on very smoothly and soaks right into your skin. You can use on you neck and face! I love it!
Not as thick and creamy as it used to be years ago. it's watered down

reviews.title: Can use on your face
reviews.review_text: Seem pretty good , wanted to use on face
Gold bond is a great brand and walmart prices are great
I've used it before and am very happy with it. I use it daily.
My son uses this cream and it's the only thing he has found that works well for him.

reviews.title: Feels really soft
reviews.review_text: Felt nice and soft, I will not be using in my face again because of some pimples that popped up.
i love the gold bond products makes me soft and cure my dry skin

reviews.title: Gold Bond body and face Moisture cream
reviews.review_text: Cream is amazing. Even works on chapped feet.

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.review_text: Have used Gold Bond for years. It is very good

reviews.title: Good Product
reviews.review_text: I have tried numerous moisturizers and have always found Gold Bond to be the best.

reviews.title: Top notch product-poor container
reviews.review_text: LOVE the lotion but the 14 oz pump needs revising. Leaves at least 2 oz of product in it after the pump quits pulling it in. Then you're left to remove the pump and try to get the remainder out. Got to be a better delivery system for the product. Put your creative dept to work.
This product works great. Fantastic for dry skin. I saw a difference within 2 days. Will continue to buy as needed.

reviews.title: Amazing Ingredients especially for Acne Prone skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great quality facial moisturizer. It is noncomedogenic and has 5 ceramides! I really think Gold Bond should highlight the 5 ceramides for marketing. Grapeseed oil, vitamins C + E, niacinamide, glycerin, etc. I hope this product stays in the brand because I keep seeing sizes being limited and I absolutely love it. It feels nourishing without being too heavy. Excellent job Gold Bond!

reviews.title: Not great
reviews.review_text: I had temporary relief from dryness on my hands for about 5 mins and then I felt like I needed more lotion again. I feel like my dry hands got worse using this lotion and no matter how many times a day I used it I never saw any improvement. The Healing or Softening lines of this Gold Bond lotion are better. They were both sold out at the time, which is why I opted for this alternative. Won't be buying again.

reviews.title: Still soft after washing hands!
reviews.review_text: I usually go through hand cream like air but I put this on and it keeps my hands soft and moisturized even after working with my hands and rinsing them off several times - I love it, already bought a bigger size so I can have some in bathroom and some in the bedroom. I have put it on my face on extra dry spots and that's been nice too.

reviews.title: Best lotion ever!!!
reviews.review_text: I've tried almost every lotion and cream out there and this is the best lotion with safe ingredients! No irritating fragrance or ginger, like other gold bond products. It absorbs so quickly and does not leave any greasiness or stickiness. It's not the most hydrating lotion for dry skin, it's more for normal skin. Dry skin really needs a thick cream. It comes out thick but melts into a thin watery lotion like feel. Hours later my skin was so soft. Great for diabetics, like me. Just try it out! Can definitely use on face as all ingredients are safe according to an ingredient check website.

reviews.title: Wonderful product!!!
reviews.review_text: This has been a game changer, I've switched from Ceravae to this, not only does it have the ceramides and niacinimide but it also has hylauronic acid. It does work best on damp skin, just spritz with water or rose water then apply this cream to face, neck and chest and anywhere else you're dry. It's awesome, I won't go back!

reviews.title: My Go To Lotion
reviews.review_text: I've known about Gold Bond products for a long time, but only recently have I discovered how great they are! I've been using Eucerin for years but it just wasnt doing it for me anymore so I tried this stuff. It's so moisturizing, without the heavy %26 greasy feel. I love that it can be used on the face too. 👍

reviews.title: Good moisturizing lotion
reviews.review_text: Great lotion. Soaks in quickly and hydrates well.

reviews.title: I did not receive this product
reviews.review_text: I did not receive this lotion and it is charged on the receipt :(
Great product. Does what it says. Skin feels so soft.

reviews.title: Bad for face
reviews.review_text: Not good for the face, burns, dries skin out, and made me break out
i used on hands %26 elbows. absorbs %26 dry to touch . NOT greasy. Awesome product !
I didn't received the item this time. It never came

reviews.title: overall great product
reviews.review_text: I have used several different products in the past and most of them were good, but this is probably my favorite good quality, it has a good consistency, non greasy and the amount you get for the price is more than most.

reviews.title: Absorbs with the quickness
reviews.review_text: This is really good lotion. It abosrbs very quick and no scent. I bought this to keep in my work van. I will be getting a bigger bottle to keep at the house.

reviews.title: Excellent Product
reviews.review_text: This Gold Bond Pure Moisture is the best lotion for my dry skin. I love it. It absorbs into my skin and not greasy, its soft and nice on my 91 year old skin.! I use it on my face too. Never want to be without it.

reviews.title: light weight and soothing
reviews.review_text: this is a great lightweight, gentle moisturizer. For reference, I am combo skin with occasional dry area. If using other actives, thus is great and sometimes I layer a heavier moisturizer on top.

reviews.title: it works for dry and cracked skin fast
reviews.review_text: this lotion works very well to actually target dry and cracked skin. you can use this many places and it will work. the smell is plain and not too strong.
Works great on sensitive skin. No rash. I love how it adds to my dry skin. My teenage son and I both use it. Works wonderful for dry skin after washing dishes.

I purchased both of the facial creams. I was excited when I purchased I had been using Goldbond healing cream for a good while and I love it. Unfortunately I am highly allergic to something in the face cream . My face turn to blissters my face feels and looks awfull . I have never been allergic to anything in my life .I hope you better luck with it

reviews.title: Bad Smelling
reviews.review_text: I used the Daily Moisture with the fresh clean smell and loved the lotion. I bought the new product and I do not like it at all. It has a horrible smell to it and I threw the bottle out. Bring back the other daily moisture lotion with the fresh clean smell.

reviews.title: Excellent formula, horrible pump bottle
reviews.review_text: I've been using the Gold Bond anti itch formula for a few years and it works well however every 5.5 oz pump container doesn't function. I'm retired from 40 years in the service industry and have followed the instructions so it's very frustrating that I have to unscrew the container for each use.

reviews.title: Very thick
reviews.review_text: The ad shows a nurse putting it on hands and face and getting back to work. I bought it thinking maybe it was a light consistency with aloe, but it's really thick with a scent, which is nice, and takes a while to 'soak in.' I have it at work, but it's more of a nighttime lotion/cream. I'd only apply to my face if I'm "slugging."

reviews.title: I will buy again.
reviews.review_text: I have extremely sensitive skin and have tried the gambit of mid to high priced solutions. I was able to use Gold Bond Face

reviews.title: good moisturizer for face and body
reviews.review_text: it's a good moisturizer. Ok texture, medium consistency. Very affordable and functions as expected. No fragrance.

reviews.title: LOVE IT!
reviews.review_text: Great product! As with most creams I was skeptical at 1st because of false claims...but this lives up to its description!!!
I use on my neck, face and throat. Its non greasy, not runny, just a silky smooth feel. Im 54 and look five years younger!$
I've used other Gold Bond products so I thought I would give this a try and it worked nicely. It's lightweight and absorbs quickly..

reviews.title: face cream
reviews.review_text: this is the best face lotion keeps my skin hydrated for hours. i wear it under my makep before sunscreens too.

reviews.title: Bring back the old fragrance free healing lotion formula!
reviews.review_text: My daughter and I had an allergic reaction to this and can't try any other fragrance free formulas because they have oats in them. The fragrance free healing lotion you used to have was great, it's sad you changed it, now my family has to look for a new lotion.

reviews.title: Amazing! Has me glowing
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a lightweight daily moisturizer and the Pure Moisture grabbed my attention. I've only used it three times and already gotten compliments on my glowing skin!!

reviews.title: Does a good job
reviews.review_text: This is a good go to for dry or rashy skin. It is not greasy or oily like some. I use this a lot right after a bath or shower in the winter when the air is cold and dry.

reviews.title: Good lightweight moisturizer
reviews.review_text: This product is good, lightweight and makes the body silky but not i found out its not moisturising enough for my elbow. Since i have started using it my elbow has became crusty and needs something more heavy duty.

reviews.title: Silky and soft
reviews.review_text: I started using this product a month ago. It's great I have seen a huge difference on my face and next texture. But best of all the price. Hope they don't discontinue or change the ingredients.

reviews.title: Rubs right in
reviews.review_text: One of the better face creams I used as a dude. Goes on and sets pretty quickly.

reviews.title: Best lotion
reviews.review_text: I love that this lotion absorbs right in, doesn't feel greasy and your skins feels so good
Love this lotion. My child has eczema an this help her skin stay hydrated.

reviews.title: I only bought these about a week ago
reviews.review_text: The lotion seems to be working much better than the one I was using
Really works. love the " no smell", able to use in conjunction with other lotions.
My child LOVES this lotion and it's very good for her skin that she even uses on her face.

reviews.title: Great moisturizer
reviews.review_text: Love gold bond moisturizers and the price is so reasonable at Walmart!
Not greasy, don't irritate my sensitive skin and lasts a long time!

reviews.title: moisturizer
reviews.review_text: This lotion is good for moisturizing dry skin

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.review_text: Love that it's fragrance free and absorbs quickly. Very moisturizing — a must have during winter!

reviews.title: Not greasy
reviews.review_text: Very nice lotion. It's not greasy at all. I do recommend it for everyone.

reviews.title: good product does what it says
reviews.review_text: l love it it really works well on dry skin once a day is all you need

reviews.title: A Rave Review
reviews.review_text: So many good ingredients, but how does it perform? Wonderfully! No smell/odor, medium weight, soaks in quickly and doesn't leave residue. Have been using for 1+year, and highly recommend! Would be great if this was sold in a ~2oz size; the 5.5oz size is too big for travel. Hand lotion is something I carry with me at all times.

reviews.title: Sad Replacement for Daily Moisturizing Lotion
reviews.review_text: Please bring back your Daily Moisturizing lotion! This is such a poor replacement for such a simple, and clearly liked product.

reviews.title: Not to bad ok
reviews.review_text: I use this stuff like crazy 🤪 😜 😳. I work in saw dust an 🪵 all day. Very effective 👍🏼. I like the none scented kinda. Absorption is great 👍🏼. Packaging 📦 is on 👉 point. Bt could cut ✂️ dwn on ingredients 👍🏼 👀

This lotion has changed my skin so much. For years I have suffered with extreme dry skin I have used everything!! Gold bond is the truth I will never go back to nothing else!!! My skin looks and feels amazing 🤩

reviews.title: Gold Bond Face and body lotion.
reviews.review_text: This stuff is great I use it every day. Gave some too a friend. He asked me where to get it after a couple of days. He said it was great and helped his skin also

reviews.title: Effective cream for dry skin.
reviews.review_text: Very effective. Thick, but spread smoothly. Size fit into travel bag.

reviews.title: Head to Tail
reviews.review_text: I used it after the stomach flu. Was like a miracle! This flu gets you from your head to your....🤭

reviews.title: Awful!
reviews.review_text: Very disappointed with this new lotion. Too thick, smells like band aids.
I bought your crepe correction and tried it. It didn't work. I used it every day for 3 to 4 weeks and no change of any kind. I like your products but this one doesn't work.

reviews.title: It's an ok face and body lotion for me.
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] It is ok when i apply it.But seems like i didn't put anything in my skin.It is creamy.My skin doesn't feel hydrated and feels dry.I don't like it that it doesn't have a little scent.I'm not so satisfied in it.

reviews.title: Love this Lotion!
reviews.review_text: I Absolutely love this lotion! The number one reason I love it is because It's not greasy! It also absorbs quickly and leaves a silky feel to your skin! I've been searching for a long time for the perfect lotion and I finally found it! Please do not change the formula or stop making this one!

reviews.title: Good but not great
reviews.review_text: I bought this because my hands are dry year-round, and with cooler weather coming, I knew I needed something better than what I'd been using. I try to buy all my toiletries fragrance-free and for sensitive skin. This is nice, but it's not quite as moisturizing as I'd hoped. However, it's still better than anything else I've tried, so I'm buying one for work use, too.

reviews.title: Great product!
reviews.review_text: I liked it so much that I bought some before I ran out of the sample. I have very sensitive skin, and have to be careful with lotion. This lotion has no added scent, and leaves my skin feeling smooth and soft. I think it even helps relieve the hives I get from medications!

reviews.title: Ultimate face and body moisturizer
reviews.review_text: Urea, Niacinamide, hyaluronic acid and more ingredients that really makes this moisturizer the ultimate face and body cream! I use this more as a face moisturizer and it is the best moisturizer I've ever used ingredients wise. Urea is one of those that are so rare with American drugstore skincare products which I only see most often in Japanese brands. I love this moisturizer so much!

reviews.title: Holy Grail Lotion For The Oily/Acne Prone Crowd
reviews.review_text: I'm not a user of most of gold bond's products as most have parabens as well as occlusive ingredient combos that are too thick for me like shea butter,petrolatum and dimethicone(which are very good ingredients in themselves,just not for me).Gold Bond is giving J

reviews.title: Dry, itchy skin
reviews.review_text: I have horribly itchy skin. I am so very dry and I think I even have developed eczema. This is very hydtaring It doesn't burn on broken skin. It seems to absorb nicely. I would buy this again. Not enough to know exact thoughts, but I would buy to try and see if it would heal my skin.

reviews.title: Best lotion I've ever had
reviews.review_text: I love gold bond lotion and this one is one of the best, after covid I have been super dry not only on my skin but lips too. I haven't put this on my lips but have used on my skin and it has helped me stay moisturized longer. I am still experiencing dry skin but with gold bond it last longer than most.

reviews.title: This Gold Bond is Amazing!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I am in love the the Gold Bond Pure Moisture Daily Body & Face Lotion!! I was used to some of their past products, that were a bit too oily for me. This new Pure Moisture Daily Body & Face Lotion is amazing!!! My hands and skin are both super dry, due to Fall and will be worse in the Winter. This lotion has already helped with that, in just a few days. I cannot wait to continue using it and see how well it works. It soaks in quickly, stays full of moisture even after washing and smells amazing! I would definitely recommend it!

reviews.title: Great lotion for everyday use!
reviews.review_text: I use this lotion everyday on my body and my face. It is not greasy and absorbs quickly and is good for sensitive skin. I like that it is non-comedogenic and fragrance free so that I can use it on my acne prone face. I also use it on my extremely dry hands throughout the day and it has helped tremendously with the cracking and ashiness on my hands.

reviews.title: Another great Gold Bond product
reviews.review_text: This is a light-to-medium weight moisturizer that absorbs quickly and leaves no greasy feeling. I have tried it on my face (combination skin) and on my hands and it worked well for both. I'm not sure about the "24 Hours Hydration" in the case of my hands, but I wash them frequently, so I would not expect it. I do feel like my face was hydrated for 24 hours.

reviews.title: Great for body and face.
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I have used Gold Bond before but the pure moisture is the best one I have used. I feel comfortable using this on my face since it is free of parabens, dyes and perfumes. Now my skin was itchy dry and this made such a difference. It dries quickly so i can use before bed even.

reviews.title: Good Moisture
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I really liked this lotion overall. When using it on my face I noticed it had the right amount of moisture. Other face lotions I've used in the past either absorb quickly and leave my face feeling dry or they sit and make my face feel greasy, this didn't do either.

reviews.title: Great body Moisturizer
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is a great moisturizer. I used it on my face and body. I like the watery feel on my face. It dried and made it feel dry and tight. I had to apply another moisturizer to stop this. I would not recommend it for the face. I loved the way it made the skin on my body feel. I have been having problems with dry cracking feet. It helped with the dryness of my feet but it didn't last. My skin stayed hydrated for a short time but it didn't last to the end of the day,

reviews.title: Great lotion
reviews.review_text: This really felt good on my skin, made it feel moisturized throughout the day; really like the fact you can use it on your face AND your body; but I chose to use it on my body. Worked out well to have the lotion at my office for when my hands get really dry. Definitely makes skin feel better.

reviews.title: Another High-Quality Gold Bond Product!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Being a user of Gold Bond products for some time now, I was excited to try this product. Having a product that enables me to combine steps in my daily skincare regimen is great! Providing the same effective hydration as their standalone lotion, it provides a convenience as you're now able to achieve the same results using one less product. I was worried initially because it has a thinner consistency than their hand/body lotion but I was very satisfied after use as there wasn't a noticeable difference in how my hands/body looked and felt while still providing a superior level of moisturizing.

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.review_text: I love this Gold Bond lotion. I can feel the improvement it makes on my skin in just a couple uses. I didn't feel it was too oily and the consistency was great. I love the thicker lotions that don't slime through the fingers. I already went out and bought a new bottle. It's my new favorite lotion!

reviews.title: Works for my sensitive skin
reviews.review_text: I'm very picky about putting stuff on my face because of how sensitive my skin is so, it was with much caution that I put this on my face and to my surprise it was great on my face and neck. I didn't break out. It was a nice texture. I was pleased with it.

reviews.title: The best
reviews.review_text: This is the best hand lotion I have used! I have used it on my face also. This my go to when I need lotion in my car, purse and work. It's not greasy, leaves my hands and face very soft and reasonably priced. Another thing that impresses me is how long it's been on the market.

reviews.title: For Real!
reviews.review_text: I never really believed all the hype about Gold Bond, so I never bought any to try. Then I got a sample in my Walmart Beauty Box, and oh my goodness! It's not just hype. This stuff really works! I must admit, for the first few seconds it feels just a tad greasy. But it sinks quickly into my skin, and then all I feel is smooth and comfortable. It is amazing on my hands, feet, elbows, and knees and is so wonderful in the dry winter months. It has become a "must-have" because it makes my skin feel healthy, hydrated, and soothed. I highly recommend it.

reviews.title: Great finish
reviews.review_text: I was looking forward to trying this and it didn't disappoint. It leaves a hydrated, non greasy and non tacky finish. It gives a smooth touch without the icky sticky lotion aftermath you frequently get from others. Great for dry skin, there was a noticeable improvement with use.

reviews.title: Blends and moisturizes exceptionally well!
reviews.review_text: I have been using this moisturizer on my face in the morning and evening after cleansing. It blends in to my skin with ease. It also moisturizes exceptionally well, despite the frigid winter weather where we live. I do not need to reapply during the day!

reviews.title: Perfect skincare lotion❤️❤️
reviews.review_text: I have been using this Gold Bond Pure Moisture Body and Face Lotion for almost a year then absolutely like its smooth and silky texture. Plus many advantages such as non sticky, non greasy and very well hydrated. And the most convenient is that I can use it for both face and body.

reviews.title: Hydration Goldbond
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I loved this Goldbond daily moisterizer body & face I typically use it for my face & will continue to use it for my face it didn't give me no allergy at all Good product would recommend it to anyone

reviews.title: No irritating fragrance!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I am impressed with this lotion. I like how it comes in a hygienic tube and the addition of grape seed oil and hyaluronic acid. I haven't noticed much change in my skin texture yet, but I learned the best way to apply the lotion is by patting a small amount on. Rubbing too much in leads to an oily residue.

reviews.title: Don't spray correctly
reviews.review_text: Always bought Gold bond power and spray with good results , but the new style spray can is worthless. It only sprays occasionally. I have the arrows lined up and still don't spray. Both foot spray and body spray. I will not buy again.. Better results with generic

reviews.title: Gold bond pure moisture
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Love this moisturizer not only for your hands it's for your face too , doesn't clog pores, it's very lightweight and your skin drinks it right in, there are 7 moisturizers and 3 vitamins amazing for the skin free of parabens plus there is hyaluronic acid scent free , this leaves skin , would highly recommend

reviews.title: Not a pleasant smell
reviews.review_text: Although I feel that the product does what it says and gives great moisture to the skin the smell is just horrible. Based on the smell alone I would not recommend this product. It does make the skin silky soft and seems to last all day. I would love this product and purchase again if they changed the scent.

reviews.title: GOLD BOND LOTION, PURE MOISTURE
reviews.review_text: I AM A FAN OF GOLD BOND. IT GETS ME THRU THE WINTER BECAUSE OF DRY SKIN. IT WORKS GREAT ON MY LEGS AND FEET AND I KEEP IT IN MY PURSE SO I CAN APPLY IT TO MY HANDS WHEN I'M OUT AND ABOUT. EASY TO CARRY AND I BOUGHT ANOTHER TO KEEP BEDSIDE! YOU WILL SEE SMOOTH SKIN RESULTS!

reviews.title: The Bond review
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Upon using Gold Bond Pure Moisture lotion, I have to say I was slightly disappointed. I've used their other products to great satisfaction but this lotion left me lacking. It is rather too thin for my taste and doesn't absorb the way I want it to. Being free of dyes & parabens is healthy, yet a little fragrance wouldn't hurt. Overall I guess it would do In a pinch but I don't recommend it.

reviews.title: Lotion is good BUT....
reviews.review_text: This lotion is great for dry skin. I do think the packaging is a tad misleading and makes me think it will be thicker but it's decent. I mostly gave this a semi poor review because this was in the Walmart beauty box subscription and I was expecting better products. I was hoping the "BEAUTY BOX" would be more skincare (for the face), makeup and nail products. Hopefully the next one will be better.

reviews.title: Great for hands!
reviews.review_text: With so much hand-washing due to COVID and general hygiene, this product has been wonderful. Keeps my hands moisturized and soft for hours. Not heavy or greasy, the lotion absorbs quickly. I always put a layer on before heading out into the cold -- keep my hands from cracking and getting dry

reviews.title: Love this moisturizer!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I love this moisturizer! This is especially perfect for sensitive skin like mine! It rubs in so smoothly & soaks into the skin so fast without leaving a film or leaving your skin oily, my skin also felt very refreshed and bouncy after rubbing it in! The size for the price is also amazing and very convenient ! Love this product and highly recommend!

reviews.title: Wal Mart Beauty BOX
reviews.review_text: I loved all the items in my Beauty box. It is so cool to be able to test brands and items that I would normally not purchase. I have found some items like the Gold Bond hand cream that have become Holy Grails for my beauty routine. I look forward to getting my box every month- It is like a self care gift to myself. I believe every person should be able to spoil themselves a little and this is a very affordable way to do that!

reviews.title: Gold Bond Pure Moisture Lotion
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I found the lotion to be pleasing. No fragrance is appreciated so that there is no conflict with my personal fragrances. I also like that Gold Bond has added Hyaluronic acid to the formula. Goes on nicely but is a little slick for my taste - may be the grapeseed oil.

reviews.title: Another Hit From Gold Bond Collection
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I was eager to try the new Gold Bond Pure Moisture Lotion Body & Face Lotion, since I use another lotion from this brand. I have flaky, dry sensitive skin and was glad this lotion has Hyaluronic Acid and free of parabens, dyes and fragrance free. The texture is thick with a creamy consistency. This lotion goes on silky smooth and fast absorbing in my skin and I feel the moisture in my skin. Definitely my go to lotion for these colder months ahead.

reviews.title: Exceptional
reviews.review_text: I just recently starting using Gold Bond Pure Moisture! I was looking for a product that does it all and now I've found it...not only is it a great all over daily moisturizer but it replaces the expensive face serum I use daily because it accomplishes the same results and has a lot of the same beneficial ingredients (plus some) that the higher price tags have. It goes on smoothly and the results are immediate, it's a perfect solution for all my moisturizing needs in one convenient tube plus I carry it with me for any needed dryness during the day, great product at a great price

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.review_text: This lotion was amazing! I work in a nursing home and I have to wash my hands many many times a day. This lotion kept on my hands through 4 hand washes and maybe even more! It made my skin moisturized and soft. Usually I have to reapply lotion after every wash but this stayed on my hands through 4 plus washes. I will be buying the full size bottle for sure ❤️

reviews.title: A GREAT LOTION!
reviews.review_text: My husband and I both LOVE this lotion! The ingredients are clean, it moisturizes like a dream and doesn't leave skin feeling greasy or yucky. We've had a terrible time finding it recently and we will be hard pressed to find anything that comes close to this.

reviews.title: My Go To Lotion For Chapped Skin
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I really like this lotion! This Gold Bond lotion is not greasy, does not have a smell and works wonderfully! I really feel like you get 24 hour moisture with this lotion. I use it after my shower in the evening and I do not need to apply lotion to my extremely dry legs again until the following evening. I have really dry sensitive skin so I don't like to use perfumy lotion. I use this lotion on my face and body and have not noticed any breakouts on my face which is good, I have very sensitive skin on my face.

reviews.title: Best of BOTH Worlds
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] How awesome is it that this stuff can be used for body OR face? I've been trying to streamline by routine and I appreciate that now I have one product for two purposes. My skin drinks up the hyaluronic acid and the moisture stays with me all day. My skin can be somewhat acne prone and it hasn't broken me out, so I think I found a winner. My husband likes that it doesn't have fragrance and he's been using it too for his hands.

reviews.title: Perfect lotion for every day use!
reviews.review_text: I have tried several different varieties of the Gold Bond brand lotion and this is one of my favorites! Living in Minnesota, the winter is really rough on my hands, especially after the last two years of more frequent hand sanitizer use. This lotion really helped rehydrate my hands and kept them from getting red, sore, and cracked. A perfect lotion to keep in my purse for the winter!

reviews.title: Disappointed One
reviews.review_text: I've been looking everywhere for the Daily Moisture w/Vitamin E to no avail. Bought this and truly disappointed as it is sticky and smells bad even tho it's supposed to be unscented. I loved the fresh scent of the Daily Moisture w/Vit E, please bring that product back to us! PLEASE!

reviews.title: Hydration Heaven
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I have been using GoldBond for years as their creams always help soothe and heal my skin. This new Pure Moisture lotion lives up to the GoldBond name. The combination of Hyaluronic acid and grape seed oil works perfectly to moisturize my skin and keep it hydrated all day long. This does not clog my pores, easily absorbs and makes my skin feel amazing.

reviews.title: Feel Hydrated
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Very good moisturizer and face lotion. I have to say I was very surprised how hydrated my skin felt. It's always hot where I live and even know it's humid my skin dries out and this product helped immensely. I would have giving it 5 stars except even know it says fragrance free there is an ordor. Doesn't smell bad but not great. I would recommend this product if the smell doesn't bother you. It made my skin feel good I overlooked the smell.

reviews.title: Skin So Soft
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I have always been a Gold Bond fan but this new Pure Moisture lotion is beyond fantastic. It contains 7 moisturizers and 3 vitamins. The lotion goes on smooth and silky and leaves no greasy feeling or residue. It has helped my dry cracked skin restore to its natural beauty.

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I got to try the gold bond Pure Moisture Daily Body & Face Lotion and I love it. It has no scent to it, absorbs completely without any residual, and really leaves my skin soft and smooth. The consistency is nice and creamy. Very impressed with how well it absorbs and works hydrating my skin.

reviews.title: Love this product
reviews.review_text: Had only used their powder in the past but this lotion was AWESOME. I tend to get very chalky in the winter and I kept this next to my computer all day long. Applied about 2x a day and my hands stayed soft. Not sticky. I did not try it on my face though. I have not purchased a full size yet at this has lasted a long time already!

reviews.title: Pure Moisture Daily Body & Face Lotion
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This Lotion is very good and helps to retain my skin moisture keeping it soft plus it is naturally sourced grapeseed oil to help lock in my skin moisture for 24-hour hydration and can be used daily without any irritation and most of all to me it is free of parabens, dyes, and fragrances

reviews.title: Great for this weather and to come.
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This lotion really surprised me I've heard gold bond is good but its amazing I love all the fun facts about it like #1 it dont clog your pores. #2 dermatologist tear. #3 has 7 moisturizer's + 3 vitamins. #4 If you do not like sented lotions this is for you also.#5 24 hours hydration now this is a lotion its for you face or hands I've been using for my hands with this cold weather and washing dishes hands were getting really dry till I started using this lotion if you dont have this at home I would hurry and get it before this winter hits.

reviews.title: A great All Over lotion
reviews.review_text: The Gold Bond Pure Moisture Body and Face Lotion is the best overall lotion I have ever used. I love the fact is moisturizes well and I do not have to use two separate lotions. Easy, Simple and works. If you suffer from dry areas on your face, but do not want to spend a bunch on a facial lotion and a body, grab this one. It will take care of it all-in-one.

reviews.title: No acne from this!
reviews.review_text: I have tubes and pumps of other moisturizers specifically for face or for body, but they cause breakouts even when applied conservatively. If I apply those to my hands at bedtime, I get breakouts on my face and neck because I am a side sleeper. This is the best skin product for me ever—ever! I hope it is available for years! I use this only on my face and hands since I have other Gold Bond lotions for other use, except for my face.

reviews.title: Goldbond
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Goldbond pure moisture daily body and face lotion is amazing! Skin feels silky smooth without a greasy feeling! I love this lotion for my super dry arms and legs in this dry season! Great for your purse or leave in bathroom!

reviews.title: Great for dry, sensitive skin
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I am really enjoying this moisturizer. I love that it can be used on both face and body, and that it works well on both areas. It's a thicker, creamier consistency (great for dry skin), but it doesn't leave my face feeling greasy. It actually sinks into the skin lightning quick! It's been working great on my combo skin...its soft and moisturized without getting extra oily. Plus, no breakouts! I love that it is fragrance free, too. Overall, I think this is a really nice drugstore option, especially headed into the winter.

reviews.title: Nice soft love it
reviews.review_text: Very smoothe. Just a joy to wake my face up with moisture Dr

reviews.title: product loss
reviews.review_text: when you get to the bottom of the bottle last 20% the lotion will not pump out. I had about 4 of the 18 ounces left in the bottle

reviews.title: I love this lotion

reviews.title: Just a good product
reviews.review_text: Gold Bond has some wonderful products. This is some great feeling lotion and it doesn't leave me feeling greasy at all. I like to use it when I get out of the shower.

reviews.review_text: This has become my favorite hand and body lotion. I have not tried it on my face. Scent is great. It's not a heavy cream and has hyaluronic acid which is awesome for the skin.

reviews.title: Super Wonderful Lotion
reviews.review_text: I have always loved the Gold Bond products and this one didn't disappoint. My hands were extremely dry from working outside on my farm and I used this before bed and the next morning they were smooth as butter. It isn't real greasy feeling either.

reviews.title: Long Lasting Gold Bond
reviews.review_text: Gold Bond Bonds with my skin to give it a Smooth long lasting softness and hydrated feel. I loved it. I especially like using it on my neck where my skin can be extra dry on cold days!!

reviews.title: Awesome

reviews.review_text: This is a good lotion for your hands and body. It is lightweight and it absorbs quickly into the skin. It gives a great amount of moisture and hydration that lasts all day. It doesn't leave a greasy feel either.

reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I am very pleased with this lotion it left my hands very soft and they didn't feel heavy or greasy at all and I will defiantly be buying this from now on.

reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Pure Moisture Lotion worked really well on my hands, legs and feet. I immediately saw a difference in my skin. The fine lines on my face were visibly reduced.

reviews.review_text: I have to wash my hands constantly at work. This lotion was perfect for my sensitive skin on my hands. It keeps them moisturized with no scent or oil film. I actually purchased this after trying this sample. I will continue to purchase this product.

reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Pure moisture works wonders on my skin. It comes in a thick lotion not watered down, it last all day. It made my skin feel healthy and fresh. I highly recommend this product.

reviews.review_text: Gold Bond comes through for face and body in one lotion. I like that. I was able to use it on my face without any breakouts and still use it on the body and get good results.

reviews.review_text: I love the fact you can use this lotion on your face and body! I bought the larger bottle at Walmart after trying this! My skin was even good to go the following day and still felt hydrated. Gold Bond really did well with this product!

reviews.review_text: The lotion is light and absorbs well. It does not leave any greasy or heavy feeling at all. My skin was moisturized well enough which makes it definitely worth the purchase. Great value for a good product.

reviews.title: cold relief
reviews.review_text: my skin suffers most during the winter months. So, I need an effective lotion/ cream to so the job. Gold bond is good for all over body moisture care.

reviews.title: Perfect face and body lotion
reviews.review_text: I've been using this Pure Moisture lotion on my face and body this past summer, fall and winter. I'm 30 with oily, acne-prone facial skin that gets dehydrated in the winter, and dry hands. This lotion is lightweight, hydrating, non-sticky, and non-greasy. It's perfect for use with my drying acne treatments, adapapene and benzoyl peroxide. I like it for my hands and feet too.

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.review_text: I swore by this lotion until this week! Im really hoping the new bottle of Gold Bond Ultimate hydrating cream i just purchased was a bad batch (which never had before) and that this company didnt change the ingredients! This new bottle is so thin. The old ingredients the lotion was much thicker. Disappointing if it were changed. Companies cant ever leave stuff alone . Now i must be on my lotion journey again after yrs of being satisfied.
